title: the rise
author: the rise
created_time: November 20, 2022, 08:40:42 PMLast edit: December 01, 2022, 02:52:51 PM by the rise
content: Continue here : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5425021.0hello all the bounties have been STOP , the campaign only runs for 1 week, anyone. those who do not join will not get Stake in Discord and must verify sending at least 1 message in General,to ask more join here : https://t.me/confirm_bounty_scriptplease report network script work, we will close the thread soonmany of them don't follow the rules make me frustratedyou can read, that to follow you have to join discord and verification is mandatorydiscord link : https://discord.gg/GneJbNAbXJthank you for your attentionCampaign introductionBounty Campaign Dates: NOV 21 - DEC 18 lasts for 4 weeks.The distribution of tokens to participants will be arranged by the Script Network teamTokens will be distributed to participants' your wallet addresses (bep 20).Terms And ConditionsParticipants should Join Script Network on social media:- Discord - Telegram - Twitter You receive stakes for completing campaign tasks, after the end of the Testers campaign, stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula:testers tokens = number of your stakes / total number of stakes* allocated total number of tokensTesters related issues and spam messages are forbidden in the project 's official group/pages. Ask boundty related questions in CMBM servicesCheating and using bots are strictly forbidden, cheating participants could be disqualifiedFollow all updates in this thread and Discord: Script Network You may make reports every day! (or at least every 7 days) Do not quote your old report! Format for proof of authentication post: Code:Proof of authentication:- Forum Username:- Wallet address:- Twitter Profile- Discord Username:- Telegram Username: Rewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the script network twitter Page- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- must join telegram and discord, if you don't join you will not receive stake- You must make minimum of 5 retweets & 2 tweets per week. Mention script network Project, Be sure to include following hashtag  #blockchain #scripttv #freetv  #blockchaintv #earnbywatching #NFTs  #StreamingServices #ScriptTV- Every retweet must be likedReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Twitter Profile Link:Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Retweet Link 3Retweet Link 4Retweet Link 5Week 1Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2...Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post. FORM JOINRULES- All participants must join the official channel.https://discord.gg/GneJbNAbXJ- must join telegram and discord - You are required to submit at least 3 message/week on Discord- Use your referral link to invite members weekly to get more stakesEngage in conversation weeklyREWARDSno invite 1stake/week 5-49 invites 3 stake/week50-100 invites 6 stakes/week51-149 invites 9 stakes/ week200+ invites 12 stakes/weekReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Discord username:Week 1how many are invited ?- link message 1- link message 2- link message 3noteif you don't invite anyone, you don't have to fill out the weekly reportPlease make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post. FORM JOIN
